Text: Use TNod User & Password Finder 1.4.2.1 for licensens, use google to find it.

WARNING:
ESET can detect these utilities as a false virus.
Add into exclusions, the paths.
--------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall any previous version.

Add to exclusion sites in ESET White list (including the asterisks): *tnoduse.* and *tukero.*

Add to exclusion the directory where you will download TNod and where you're going to install it.

How do I install?
Simply run the .exe file?

How do I change the language?
It installs in some weird one. Anyone know how?

Installs in Swedish, lol, and I haven't found any way to change the language yet, but it's not that big of a deal. Installs and runs perfectly; you can get TNod by searching TPB, it's about 1mb, and it found and applied a valid license literally within seconds. So-o-o nice to have a working version of Nod32 again, thanks Nicke for a quality up :)
